overview: Phuon Keo lives with her two grandsons who joined her in the province of Banteay Meanchey because their mother’s husband, who lives in Koh Kong, is an alcoholic and treats them badly. She would like to be able to reunite the family to give her grandchildren a chance to go to school, but her entourage advises her to stop thinking about her daughter and only care for her two grandchildren.
title: Worry
